import pandas as pd

#read the csv file from our staging folder
df_raw = spark.read.csv(
    "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/staging/norway_medical.csv"
)
#VALUEDRUG VALUETIME VALUEGENDER
#VALUEGEOGRAPHY SUMANTALL_UNIKE_PASIENTER SUMSUM_AUP SUMSUM_DDD
#convert to a pandas df
df = df_raw.toPandas()
#Create columns for the df
df_long = df[['VALUETIME', 'VALUEGENDER', 'VALUEDRUG']]
#sort based on time period,country and gender
df_long = df_long.sort_values(by=['VALUETIME', 'VALUEGENDER', 'VALUEDRUG']).reset_index(drop=True)
#remove rows where Sex is total, only keep male and female

df_long = df_long.reset_index(drop=True)
df_long.head(30)

#convert into spark df and store in our standardized folder
spark_df = spark.createDataFrame(df_long)
output_path = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/standardized/population.parquet"
spark_df.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(output_path)
